name: betterlanguages.com
tag_list: translation, translation-services, translation-company, translation-agency, localisation, interpreting, typesetting, label-translation, legal-translation, website-translation
overview:
betterlanguages.com is a Nottingham-based translation company, providing language and translation services to companies from all areas of industry.

Since being founded in 1982, Better Languages (now betterlanguages.com) has grown its network of translators to include both UK-based and in-country translators, covering all major world languages. Translators are carefully matched to each client based on language pair and specialisms.

betterlanguages.com work with many different clients, including blue-chip companies, on both large and small translation projects, from clothing and food label translation to the translation of complex legal documents. They also provide localisation, interpreting and typesetting services.
